title: Bug 2763[Dialogs] DCR: TypeFilteringDialog should be public API (1GIYHMY)
description: Bug 2763[Dialogs] DCR: TypeFilteringDialog should be public API (1GIYHMY) The same dialog is used (and had to be copied fornow) in the Search dialog.NOTES:
EB: The org.eclipse.ui.internal.dialogs.TypeFilteringDialog should bepublic API to guarantee that selecting a type is consistent all overthe workbench.
